Post your weird optical illusions here! Be sure to explain them!

I saw this optical illusion once

Now which direction is she spinning?

Truth is, it changes. But at a different time for everyone. Just keep staring at it, it will eventually change directions.

Try it with a group of people, they will say it changed directions at different times due to how their specific brain comprehends the image.

Try it!

This version helps to see both of them, just cover the left or right dancer.

Here's another optical illusion which changes a black and white image into a colored one by staring at a negative colored image.

http://www.michaelbach.de/ot/ is a great site with some other optical illusions.
Because of the angle of the reflection on the floor, she must be spinning with her extended leg pointing away from us when it is moving right-to-left.
This train is basicly the same as that dancer, it goes both ways (look at it while thinking about a direction and it'll start going in that direction.)
